scope: UX consistency audit for abletools_qt.py (control sizing, layout rules, alignment)
notes: Audit focuses on rules from docs/UX_STYLE_GUIDE.md and docs/UI_CATALOG.md. Record outliers and prioritize fixes.

tasks.title: Remove per-screen size overrides
tasks.details: Audit and remove min/max/fixed widths or heights set outside factory helpers (e.g., root_value width, detail_box width, search_edit width, source_list width, data_list max width, top_* max heights, log min height). Replace with shared helpers or size policy.

tasks.title: Replace QFormLayout with row/column helpers
tasks.details: QFormLayout usage violates the row/column-only rule. Migrate detail forms to _grid/_hbox/_vbox helpers with aligned label columns.

tasks.title: Verify control-row alignment for mixed widgets
tasks.details: Audit rows that mix labels/line edits/combos/buttons (e.g., Catalog filters row, UX Lab control variants) for baseline and border alignment once size overrides are removed.

tasks.title: Update UI catalog to match row-based detail layouts
tasks.details: Catalog and Preferences detail panes now use row-based vbox/hbox layouts instead of QFormLayout; update docs/UI_CATALOG.md to reflect the current layout inventory.
